jobDescription: Overall Summary: Reporting to the Vice President of Sales Reporting and Analysis in the Corporate Finance department, the Senior Business Analyst position is responsible for the tracking and validation of numerous data sources (internal and external), controlling their accuracy, and verifying they all stay in synch. The Senior Business Analyst will play a key role in data integration and organization. The Senior Business Analyst prepares both regular and ad hoc reporting that supports Corporate Reporting where accuracy and insight is critical.  The Senior Business Analyst must be comfortable managing complex projects with multiple stakeholders, and ensure project statuses are regularly and clearly communicated.Major Responsibilities
